channel.title: It's Those Foreigners
channel.description: It's Those Foreigners is a regular podcast that presents multicultural stories and commentary from American writer Jim Curtiss.

item.title: The Mad Russian
item.itunes:author: Jim Curtiss
item.itunes:subtitle: A Prague Story
item.itunes:summary: The Mad Russian - A game of catch in Prague's Kampa Park turns into an intertcultural incident when two American expats allow a first- timer to join them.
